title: Is this some kind of spam ??
selftext: Why are these random international callers giving missed calls on WhatsApp ?? Has anyone else received similar missed calls ??
comments: Yes i too have recieved WhatsApp calls but from Ethiopia (+251) , yours is from thailand
i'm getting calls from Colombia, Russia
Do not pick such calls. Govt just issued notice regarding scams.
Initially, I thought some HR is trying to reach out to me. ðŸ¥²
What would happen if we accidentally pick such calls?

They hardly ring for one second. Even if the phone was in your hand, by the time you get a notification and read it the call is already disconnected. 

I don't think we are that quick answering an unknown international call, we tend to think for a moment. But even if you manage to pick up, I think they will disconnect 

I am sure they just want you to call them back.

I don't think we are that quick answering an unknown international call, we tend to think for a moment.
